article_title: SEC probing Carrington hedge fund unit over 2007 subprime lender acquisition
article_text:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating the hedge-fund arm of Carrington Holding Co., LLC in relation to its 2007 purchase of bankrupt subprime lender New Century Financial Corp.'s mortgage-servicing business, according to a filing.

The investigation is one of the few remaining financial-crisis era cases still being pursued by the SEC, officials said. It comes as hedge funds and other nonbank firms have moved into...
